::Havotron/Needlenose/Dreadwing::
Havotron neared the door to the outside. "Where are the rest of my 
men."

Needlenose sighed. "I am sorry Spinister, I was surprised to seeyou, 
but yea do i want a job, you betcha.  We thought we weren't needed, 
but i guess we were after all huh ZigZag."

Dreadwing growled." Do not use sarcascim when talking of Havotron. Or 
you will be digging your own grave Constructicons. Now will you 
follow me, or will you join others in the Pit?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Spinister kept his whisper, "what no hello, for an old friend." he
> breathed in a condescending tone. "do you want in on a job?" he
> whispered again, nobody else except for Needlenose would have been 
able
> to hear it.
> ______________________________________________
> Hook transforms, folding up into a robot mode already facing 
Dreadwing.
> "I'm sure he does." Hook says in a very aloof tone. He turns his 
nose
> up, continuing his gaze. "Hear that boys. Some one wants to see 
us." he
> says, reffering to the other Constructicons.
